thread.title: Ellie Goulding debuts new hair, performs at 2015 MTV EMAs
thread.title_full: Ellie Goulding debuts new hair, performs at 2015 MTV EMAs - UPI.com

author: Annie Martin
title: Ellie Goulding debuts new hair, performs at 2015 MTV EMAs
text:
1 of 7 | License Photo MILAN, Italy, Oct. 26 (UPI) -- Ellie Goulding was among the recording artists who took the stage Sunday at the 2015 MTV Europe Music Awards.
The 28-year-old singer impressed fans with her performance of "Love Me Like You Do" from the Fifty Shades of Grey soundtrack. The song will also appear on Goulding's forthcoming third studio album, Delirium .
"My album's out on the sixth of November," she told MTV backstage. "I'm very excited about it. It's my favorite thing I've done so far and I think it's a little bit different, and I think my fans are going to like it ... I'm really excited for people to hear it."
Goulding turned heads in her plunging black gown prior to the ceremony, and also debuted a new, bright yellow hairstyle. The singer was nominated for two awards, including Best Song for "Love Me Like You Do."
Goulding last released the reissue Halcyon Days in August 2013, which includes the singles "Burn" and "How Long Will I Love You." The singer debuted Delirium 's lead single, "On My Mind," in September, and announced the new song "Army" this month.
